name: ThumBeat: Button Basher Edition
description:
ThumBeat: Button Basher Edition is a short-form, button-bashing rhythm game for busy people! Button Basher takes your preferred button bashing techniques to the max!

Key Features:


Choose from over 25 songs exclusive in rhythm games with multiple genres ranging from chiptune/8-bit to guitar!


Play each song at four different difficulty levels. Can you take each song to the Xtreme?


Be on top of the world with your high scores on the global leaderboards!


Play each song with touchscreen, mouse, keyboard or gamepad! Can you master the songs in all 4 controller modes?

- Super expert? Push the speed multiplier up and see if you can still withstand the gameplay!
